casebody.data:
<casebody firstpage="889" lastpage="889" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
 <parties id="p-1">
  IN RE: Charles Everette HINTON
 </parties>
 <docketnumber id="p-2">
  449P11-18
 </docketnumber>
 <court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of North Carolina.
 </court>
 <decisiondate id="p-4">
  March 9, 2018
 </decisiondate>
 <attorneys id="p-5">
  Charles E. Hinton, for Hinton, Charles Everette.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-6">
  Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.
 </attorneys>
 <opinion id="p-7">
  The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of February 2018 by Petitioner for Request and Demand for Final Civil Judgment by Default:
 </opinion>
 <opinion id="p-8">
  "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of March 2018."
 </opinion>
 <opinion type="majority">
  <author id="p-9">
   Ervin, J. recused
  </author>
 </opinion>
</casebody>
